DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the IOP lowering efficacy of Travoprost/Brinzolamide dosed daily in the morning or evening, vs TRAVATAN dosed once daily in the evening, and vs. AZOPT dosed BID in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Travoprost/Brinzolamide Fixed Combination Versus Travatan and Versus AZOPT
